## deta deploy

Deploy a deta micro

### Synopsis

Deploy a deta micro

```
deta deploy [path] [flags]
```

### Examples

```

1. deta deploy

Deploy a deta micro rooted in the current directory.

2. deta deploy micros/my-micro-1

Deploy a deta micro rooted in 'micros/my-micro-1' directory.
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for deploy
```
